# Create TA Increment in project

Execute the **ta-increment** workflow as a **Solution Architect**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_SA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_SA.md)

## Workflow

Create TA Increment for project:
1. Identify technical changes needed
2. Document architecture delta
3. Create tai-PRX-NNN-description.md using template

## Template

Use template: `/.teamspec/templates/tai-template.md`

## Output

projects/{id}/technical-architecture-increments/tai-PRX-*.md
